mapper.select: SELECT ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, MNG_STND_DATE AS mngStndDate, MNG_STND_CRITIC AS mngStndCritic, ERROR_COUNT AS errorCount, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, MODEL_CODE AS modelCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, UNUSL AS unusl, CALLEE_SEQ_NO AS calleeSeqNo, ERROR_METHOD AS errorMethod, ERROR_TYPE AS errorType, TOTAL_CLASSIFY_CODE AS totalClassifyCode, TERMINAL_ERROR1 AS terminalError1, TERMINAL_ERROR2 AS terminalError2 FROM ATMS_01001180

SELECT ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, MNG_STND_DATE AS mngStndDate, MNG_STND_CRITIC AS mngStndCritic, ERROR_COUNT AS errorCount, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, MODEL_CODE AS modelCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, UNUSL AS unusl, CALLEE_SEQ_NO AS calleeSeqNo, ERROR_METHOD AS errorMethod, ERROR_TYPE AS errorType, TOTAL_CLASSIFY_CODE AS totalClassifyCode, TERMINAL_ERROR1 AS terminalError1, TERMINAL_ERROR2 AS terminalError2 FROM ATMS_01001180 WHERE ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_01001180 WHERE ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}

UPDATE ATMS_01001180 SET MNG_STND_DATE = #{mngStndDate}, MNG_STND_CRITIC = #{mngStndCritic}, ERROR_COUNT = #{errorCount}, JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, MODEL_CODE = #{modelCode}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, UNUSL = #{unusl}, CALLEE_SEQ_NO = #{calleeSeqNo}, ERROR_METHOD = #{errorMethod}, ERROR_TYPE = #{errorType}, TOTAL_CLASSIFY_CODE = #{totalClassifyCode}, TERMINAL_ERROR1 = #{terminalError1}, TERMINAL_ERROR2 = #{terminalError2} WHERE ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}

INSERT INTO ATMS_01001180 ( ERROR_DATETIME, MNG_STND_DATE, MNG_STND_CRITIC, ERROR_COUNT, JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, TERMINAL_NO, CORNER_CODE, MODEL_CODE, CORNER_NAME, UNUSL, CALLEE_SEQ_NO, ERROR_METHOD, ERROR_TYPE, TOTAL_CLASSIFY_CODE, TERMINAL_ERROR1, TERMINAL_ERROR2 ) VALUES ( #{errorDatetime}, #{mngStndDate}, #{mngStndCritic}, #{errorCount}, #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{terminalNo}, #{cornerCode}, #{modelCode}, #{cornerName}, #{unusl}, #{calleeSeqNo}, #{errorMethod}, #{errorType}, #{totalClassifyCode}, #{terminalError1}, #{terminalError2} )
